headers.value: default-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'self' https://*.webflow.io https://*.koninklijkeloop.nl https://*.vercel.app; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://vercel.live https://*.vercel.live; connect-src 'self' https://*.vercel.live https://*.vercel.app; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://*.vercel.app
